attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and call an immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Public confidence in the current Parliament has been irrevocably damaged by the numerous scandals involving members of all political parties in abusing the system of expenses.  Furthermore the Speaker has completely lost all standing in Parliament through his role in several scandals.  We therefore wish to exercise our right to dismiss our representatives and vote on their replacements.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
